silex_client.utils.context module¶

class silex_client.utils.context.Context(ws_url: str = 'ws://localhost:8080')¶

Bases: object

Data class that keeps track of the current context This class should not be instanciated use the already instanciated object from this module or use the get() static method

Variables

  • config – Used to resolve configuration files, using the context’s variables

  • is_outdated – When this is true, the properties will recompute themselves when queried

static get() → silex_client.utils.context.Context¶

Return a globaly instanciated context. This static method is just for conveniance

get_action(action_name: str) → silex_client.action.action_query.ActionQuery¶

Return an ActionQuery object initialized with this context

property metadata: dict¶

Lazy loaded property that updates when the is_outdated attribute is set to True

update_dcc() → None¶

Update the metadata’s dcc key using rez environment variable

update_entity() → None¶

Update the metadata’s entity related keys using the filesystem

update_metadata(data: dict) → None¶

Merge the provided dict with the current metadata This should not be used unless for test purposes, let the metadata update utself instead

update_project() → None¶

Update the metadata’s project key using the filesystem

update_task() → None¶

Update the metadata’s task key using the filesystem

update_user() → None¶

Update the metadata’s user key using authentification
